Articles.Content: I'm having an issue with my part. I got it into the game and when I attach it to something i'm not able to pick it back up and move it. Does anyone know why? Any help is appreciated.
yeah i made one for it but do i need to set up anything in unity?
Yeah you need to add a mesh collider to your visual mesh and sellect your collider

It should look something like this, the name of the collider will be whatever you named it.

Make sure it is a convex collider or it won't be able to interact with anything in the game except kerbals.

Also the collider should be a primitive object, not on your parent mesh.

Rotate the part in unity by setting it as the child of an empty object/transform. Rotate that transform, not the actual object.
